title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 208.3 - Medical examination before contests and exhibitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 208.3 - Medical examination before contests and exhibitions

State Regulations

Before participating in contests or exhibitions, all boxers
and mixed martial artists shall submit to medical examinations performed by a
physician designated by the Commission within 36 hours before the contest or
exhibition and also within three hours before the contest or exhibition, unless
such times are modified by the Commission. Such examinations may include any
such testing the examining physician finds necessary. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
